channel.title: Keytruda on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Keytruda on FinanClub

item.title: MRK
item.description: score:-54 Chances: Merck & Co Inc has reported better-than-expected fourth-quarter results, with revenue significantly boosted year-over-year by demand for its cancer drug Keytruda. The company remains a darling of Wall Street analysts, and shares are up 20.1% over the past 12 months, indicating strong investor confidence.
